dataList.name: Growing Resentment
dataList.desc: When this unit has a relevant buff: gain Growing Resentment equal to damage taken. Expires at Turn End

dataList.name: Resentment
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Damage Up and 3 Defense Level Down
